text: Beck – Skarpt läge (English: Beck – The Scorpion) is a 2006 film about the Swedish police detective Martin Beck directed by Harald Hamrell. == Cast == *Peter Haber as Martin Beck *Mikael Persbrandt as Gunvald Larsson *Måns Nathanaelson as Oskar Bergman *Ing-Marie Carlsson as Bodil Lettermark *Marie Göranzon as Margareta Oberg *Ingvar Hirdwall as Martin Beck's neighbour *Peter Hüttner as Oljelund *Björn Bengtsson as Daniel Orberg *Källa Bie as Monika Everdag *Elisabet Carlsson as Lillemor Bernér *Magnus Mark as Hugo Bernér *Embla Hjulström as Simone Bernér *Hampus Nyström as Leo Everdag *Simon Blyberg as Sebastian Everdag *Ylva Lööf as Viola Furnäs == References == * == External links == * Category:Swedish films Category:Martin Beck films Category:2006 television films Category:2000s crime films Category:Films directed by Harald Hamrell Category:2000s police procedural films
title: Beck – Skarpt läge
